author: robk82
post_text: December 2, 2018 at 11:59 PM#1Long story for why I want to do this...But is it possible to change the patch of a specific fixture or group of fixtures with a macro? I want to move every fixture forward one place. For example fixture 505 is patched at 1.050 and I want it to move to 1.051I may be in Lua territory, what do you think?

posts.author: robk82
posts.post_text: December 2, 2018 at 11:59 PM#1Long story for why I want to do this...But is it possible to change the patch of a specific fixture or group of fixtures with a macro? I want to move every fixture forward one place. For example fixture 505 is patched at 1.050 and I want it to move to 1.051I may be in Lua territory, what do you think?

posts.author: Duplicate Ryan Kanarek
posts.post_text: December 3, 2018 at 10:37 PM#2You can reassign the address via normal command line syntax (Assign Fixture x DMX y.z), but you can't analyze the current address via normal command line syntax.

posts.author: robk82
posts.post_text: December 3, 2018 at 11:57 PM#3Ok cool .. This will work then.Thanks!!!

title: Change fixture patch
